alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:33PM EDT until July 08 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lexington County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Aiken County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 532 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southwest of Gaston, or 18 miles south of Red Bank, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Swansea, Wagener, North, Pelion, Springfield, Salley, Perry, Woodford, Perry Airport, Thor and Lexington County Airport At Pelion. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
